benefits.name: Ability Score Increase
effects: Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 30.

benefits.name: Blink Steps
effects: Immediately after you take the Attack action or the Magic action, you can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.
